name: Combo Wiz
description:
Play as a wizard who's entire life revolves around combos. spend your combo points for upgrades but make sure you keep enough to survive the hordes of demons coming for you. 

This entire project was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44, with the theme "Your life is currency".

Controls:

wasd/arrow = move

Left Mouse = melee attack

Right Mouse = ranged attack

Shift = dash

E = interact
